statements.select: select a.*,b.device_name from (select * from (select ROWNUM RN,T.* from ( select * from device_his_track where device_id=#DEVICE_ID# and logintime>=#StartDate# and logintime<=#EndDate# order by logintime desc ) T where ROWNUM<=#PageEnd#) where RN>#PageStart#) a left join device_info b on a.device_id=b.device_id
select count(*) as total from device_his_track where device_id=#DEVICE_ID# and logintime>=#StartDate# and logintime<=#EndDate#
select * from device_his_track where device_id=#DEVICE_ID# and logintime>=#StartDate# and logintime<=#EndDate# order by logintime
